name: granny square bag
notes:
crochet any size bag using just 3 granny squares! with this pattern, itâ€™s super easy to customize the size and colors to make a unique crochet bag. customize it down to the round or just use up some yarn scraps. whatever you choose, this granny square bag is sure to be a fun project!

materials:
* 120 grams of medium weight yarn
* 4.5mm clover amour crochet hook
* scissors
* yarn needle

dimensions (includes instructions to adjust sizing):
* bag: 26cm wide x 26cm long (10.2 x 10.2 inches)
* strap: 2.5cm wide x 44cm long (1 x 17.3 inches)
* overall: 26cm wide x 43cm long (10.2 x 16.9 inches)
